item.title: Rewriting The Narrative Of Hurricane Katrina
item.description: A new Nat Geo docuseries uses tech and survivor testimony to reframe Hurricane Katrina as a preventable digital-age failure, not just a natural disast...

item.title: ‘Intraterrestrials’ In Earth’s Deep Subsurface Defy Life As We Know It
item.description: New book illustrates how little we know about Earth’s own subsurface ‘Intraterrestrial’ life and why that could forever change astrobiology.

item.title: Starlink Down—What Caused The Global Outage And Is It Back Up Yet?
item.description: Elon Musk’s Starlink went down on Thursday afternoon, causing chaos across the globe. What caused the global outage and is it back up and running yet?

item.title: New Robot Weeders Are Coming Our Way
item.description: The ability to use robots for weeding means we can start to replace outdated and potentially dangerous herbicide applications.

item.title: What Is The Best Format To Watch ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ In The Cinema?
item.description: Is it a bird, is it a plane? No, it’s another MCU movie! The Fantastic Four: First Steps is out now in cinemas, but which is the best format to see it...
